title: Police probing two suspicious deaths in Uragasmanhandiya
content:
COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police launched an investigation over two suspicious deaths in Korakina, Uragasmanhandiya.

A 38-year-old female was found dead under suspicious circumstances inside a house while a 39-year-old man was found hanging from a roof nearby, in a suspected suicide.

However, it is reported that the man and woman were previously married to two others and were living together for over a year in the house.
